price: “Sε mobεte mo mfudeε no a, εneε monkͻ moafuo no mu anͻpa tutuutu”.
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
